articles.description: The ruling in the Google antitrust trial has led to a host of hard-to-answer questions about the future of Google's search data, which the tech giant must now share with competitors. What does that mean for users' data privacy?
articles.content:
Earlier this month, when U.S. District Judge Amit Mehta issued penalties
